name: Pong Invaders (Eli Vazquez)
description:
The Earth is in danger from a meteor shower, and it's up to you to save the day. Deflect incoming asteroids with your ship and blast them with your cannon. If even one of them reaches the ground, we're doomed!

Ranks:

15 points: Bronze

30 points: Silver

50 points: Gold

The game gets kinda unfair after that point, but see how far you can go! Post your best score in the comments.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: move

Space: Shoot

Alternate controls:

A/D or J/L: Move

S or K: Shoot
